text: Kunai bhari boknele arkako bhari bokne chaina. Ra yadi kohi bharile thici'eko vyaktile aphno bhari bokna arula'i bola'une cha bhane tyasabata usale kehi pani utha'une chaina, yadyapi tyo nikatakai sambandhi nai kina nahos. Tapa'inle ta ti manisaharula'i matra savadhana garna saknu huncha, jo nadekhikan pani aphno palanakartasita dara'umchan ra niyamita namaja padhdai garchan ra jo vyakti pavitra bandacha tyo aphno nimti nai pavitra hunecha. Ra allahatira nai pharkera januparne cha
